name: DefaultSubscriptionsComponent

propertiesClass.name: currentDefaultSubscriptions
propertiesClass.description: Default subscriptions defined in the current tenant.
propertiesClass.rawdescription: Default subscriptions defined in the current tenant.

propertiesClass.name: loading
propertiesClass.rawdescription: Whether the configuration is being loaded.

propertiesClass.name: parentDefaultSubscriptions
propertiesClass.rawdescription: Default subscriptions inherited from parent tenant.

methodsClass.name: initForm
methodsClass.rawdescription: Loads the list of apps, builds the form and hooks value change events for override switches.
methodsClass.description: Loads the list of apps, builds the form and hooks value change events for override switches.

methodsClass.name: isEmptyView
methodsClass.rawdescription: Checks if there are no application rows to be displayed.
methodsClass.description: Checks if there are no application rows to be displayed.

methodsClass.name: isSubscribed
methodsClass.rawdescription: Checks if given application is subscribed (present in the given list of applications).
methodsClass.description: Checks if given application is subscribed (present in the given list of applications).

jsdoctags.comment: The list of application objects to check against.
True, if the application is present in the list.

methodsClass.name: ngOnInit
methodsClass.rawdescription: Initializes the loading of the form and the current settings.
methodsClass.description: Initializes the loading of the form and the current settings.

methodsClass.name: save
methodsClass.rawdescription: Saves the current value of form object to backend.
methodsClass.description: Saves the current value of form object to backend.

methodsClass.name: shouldShowAppRow
methodsClass.rawdescription:
Checks if given application row should be displayed.
The row is displayed when any of its checkboxes is selected or any of the lists is being overridden.
methodsClass.description: Checks if given application row should be displayed. The row is displayed when any of its checkboxes is selected or any of the lists is being overridden.

description: The component shows the main view for managing default subscriptions configuration.
rawdescription: The component shows the main view for managing default subscriptions configuration.
